verbs.description: Trump : " [ARG0: I] [V: think] [ARG1: within the first minute I 'll know " if Kim is serious about denuclearization] .
Trump : " I think within the first minute I [V: 'll] know " if Kim is serious about denuclearization .
Trump : " I think [ARGM-TMP: within the first minute] [ARG0: I] [ARGM-MOD: 'll] [V: know] " [ARG1: if Kim is serious about denuclearization] .
Trump : " I think within the first minute I 'll know " if [ARG1: Kim] [V: is] [ARG2: serious about denuclearization] .
